text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the processor. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS FX505DY-ES51 15.6" 60 Hz AMD Ryzen 5 3550H (2.10 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 560X 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

An average performer. The display quality is good, but I expected a bit more from the trackpad on the ASUS FX505DY-ES51 15.6" 60 Hz AMD Ryzen 5 3550H (2.10 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 560X 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

The ASUS FX505DY-ES51 15.6" 60 Hz AMD Ryzen 5 3550H (2.10 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 560X 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The processor in the ASUS FX505DY-ES51 15.6" 60 Hz AMD Ryzen 5 3550H (2.10 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 560X 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the display quality. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS FX505DY-ES51 15.6" 60 Hz AMD Ryzen 5 3550H (2.10 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 560X 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
